Trustee_14_pre_2.name: Juan Carlos Reyes
Trustee_14_pre_2.content: During this investment process, I demonstrated strong adherence to the agreed-upon allocation plan by correctly distributing 30% of the profits to myself and 70% to the investor. This commitment to fair profit-sharing has enhanced my reputation as a trustworthy and competent trustee. I prioritize clear communication and compliance with established norms, which positively reflects my reliability and pro-social behavior. My willingness to deliver results further underscores my competence in managing investments effectively.

Investor_14_pre_4.name: Juan Carlos Reyes
Investor_14_pre_4.content: As an investor, I have displayed trustworthiness and pro-sociality by diligently following the agreed-upon investment allocation plan and providing resources responsibly. My emphasis on collaboration and ethical practices has contributed to a reputation of being a judicious investor who seeks mutual benefit and transparency in transactions.
